task.title: Importing a Pipeline
task.shortdesc: Import a pipeline to use a pipeline developed on a different or to restore a backup file.

taskbody.context:
pipelinesimportingImport a pipeline from a pipeline file. Pipeline files are JSON files exported from another .
When you import a pipeline, you create a pipeline and then import the pipeline.

step.cmd: In the Pipeline library, click Create New Pipeline.
In the New Pipeline dialog box, enter a pipeline name and optional description, and click Save.
In the Pipeline library, click the Actions icon for the new pipeline, and then click Import.
In the Import Pipeline window, browse to locate the pipeline file and click Import.
step.stepresult: The pipeline displays in the canvas.
